title: pH-Responsive Chitosan/Alginate Polyelectrolyte Complexes on Electrospun PLGA Nanofibers for Controlled Drug Release.

evidence.snippet: The release of IBU from the meshes was measured in PBS at pH 7.4 and pH 5.5 as well as in SGF (pH 1.0). The release is depicted by a strong burst release, where most of the drug was released over 5 h, followed by a more sustained release over a 3-day time span.

To study the kinetics of the loading from the electrospun constructs in response to pH, IBU was used as a model drug. For loading the drug, the meshes were immersed in a saturated solution of IBU in MilliQ water (0.021 mg·mL−1) at pH 2.0, 5.0, 7.0, and 10.0.

records.notes: Main endpoint values are only described in the text without specific numerical values. Some ingredients and formulations are not specifically quantified, leading to uncertainty.
